Association Residence Nursing Home
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hunt, Richard Morris (American architect, 1827-1895) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Upper floor windows at corner of building

The building was originally built for the Association for the Relief of Respectable Aged Indigent Females, created in 1813 with the help of Peter G. Stuyvesant and John J. Astor. In 1988 it was converted into a Youth Hostel. [work]
